item.title: 5.67 years of 100+ mile weeks in a row. Seems like a lot. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #runtok

item.title: And I'm inviting you to join me. There will be some long runs and hopefully you can join me for some miles. Details will be coming soon. But for now, I've said it outloud. Time to lock in. Smile, or you're doing it wrong.

item.title: I love learning from failure, but these past couple months have been rough. If you've noticed my webpage has been down, my merch unavailable, or wondered why the book timeline changed—here's why. I had to stop everything and start over. New team. New syst

item.title: Building up for the big one, 300 miles on week 300. This week? 96 hours at the fire station. Rain almost every run. Body already questioning my life choices. We like challenges. This is why we do this. Three more weeks until I attempt something truly ridi

item.title: The real ones wake up before the sun to suffer with you. Not everyone gets it. Most people think we're crazy. And honestly, they're probably right.@Eli Wehbe #runtok

item.title: Building to that 300 mile week on December 1st. 310 miles run in the past 2 weeks. Damn this is hard. My body is like, I thought this was the off season. Week 300 schedule 12/1 - San Diego 12/2 - Coronado 12/3 - Santa Monica to Newport Beach 12/4 - work
item.description: Building to that 300 mile week on December 1st. 310 miles run in the past 2 weeks. Damn this is hard. My body is like, I thought this was the off season. Week 300 schedule 12/1 - San Diego 12/2 - Coronado 12/3 - Santa Monica to Newport Beach 12/4 - work

item.title: Will you be joining me for week 300? 12/1 - San Diego 12/2 - San Diego/Coronado 12/3 - Santa Monica to Newport 12/6 - La Verne to Rialto 12/7 - Redlands to Newport Smile, or you're doing it wrong #runtok

item.title: Turkey Trot? More like Turkey Ultra. 45 miles on Thanksgiving morning. Pretty sure when my coach wrote this training plan, he forgot what day Thursday was. Or maybe he knew exactly what he was doing. Either way, I earned every bite of that Thanksgiving di

item.title: Santa Monica to Newport Beach today. Day 3 of the 300 mile challenge It was quite the challenge getting from San Diego to Los Angeles last night in the traffic, but we made it. Got a little sleep and are ready to rock. Hope to see you out there today Smi

item.title: Pulled off the win although I had to really work for it. 100 miles/161 km does not come easily. Especially when the race starts at 6pm. Born to Run 100 miler was an incredible experience and I will be back. #runtok #ultramarathon #ultrarunner #borntorun
